    • Method Detail

      • calculateDayOfWeek

        public void calculateDayOfWeek()
        Functionality: calculates day of the week from given month and day by modding the number of days that have passed in 2016 so far by 7. calculatePosition function is then called and returns accurate day of week as a string and not simply an integer position

      • calculatePosition

        public java.lang.String calculatePosition(int positionInWeek)
        Parameters:
        positionInWeek - passes in valid integer for positionInWeek Functionality: checks which day of week is at given position. Note: 0 is set to Thursday because Jan 1, 2016 was a Thursday.
        Returns:
        returns day of week as a string

      • getDayOfWeek

        public java.lang.String getDayOfWeek()
        Returns:
        returns day of week as a string

      • getMonth

        public int getMonth()
        Returns:
        returns month as an int

      • setMonth

        public void setMonth(int month)
        Parameters:
        month -

      • setDay

        public void setDay(int day)
        Parameters:
        day - Functionality: set m_day to passed in day

      • getDay

        public int getDay()
        Parameters:
        none -
        Returns:
        returns day of week as int

      • incrementDayOfWeek

        public java.lang.String incrementDayOfWeek()
        checks which day of the week it currently is
        Returns:
        returns the day after the current day
